questions.questionText:
Help us monitor the occurance and absence of mass mating mangrove crabs Ucides cordatus and Cardisoma guanhumi, in relation to the moon, between November and April each year.

This information will help to improve fishing legislation which prohibits the catch of these crabs during mass mating.

Click on the below pictures if you would like to share your observations.

For more information on this project see menu.
